definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: In medium saucepan over high heat, bring salted water to boil.
sentences.chinese: 取中號燉鍋配以高火，煮至鹽水沸騰。

sentences.english: Whisk egg yolks, sugar, lemon juice, lemon peel, and salt in medium metal bowl to blend.
sentences.chinese: 用中號的碗把蛋黃打勻加入糖，檸檬汁，檸檬皮和鹽。

sentences.english: This is the middle-sized female role, Iron Mirror princess.
sentences.chinese: 此款爲中號旦角鐵鏡公主。

sentences.english: I'd like a No. 5 meal please. Medium-sized.
sentences.chinese: 請給我一個五號中號的套餐。

sentences.english: Medium is my size for shirts and sweaters.
sentences.chinese: 我穿的襯衫和毛衣都是中號的。

sentences.english: Strain through fine-mesh sieve into medium, nonreactive bowl, discarding vanilla bean.
sentences.chinese: 將液體用中號濾網過濾至無抗電性碗中，丟掉香草籽。

sentences.english: Heat 2 tablespoons oil in medium skillet over medium-high heat.
sentences.chinese: 用中號煮鍋開中火加熱2湯勺橄欖油。

sentences.english: A medium baked potato is the size of a personal-size bar of soap.
sentences.chinese: 一份中號的烤土豆，和你浴室的肥皂一樣大小。

sentences.english: I wear medium, but there are only small and larges available.
sentences.chinese: 我穿中號的，但是這裏只有小號和大號。

sentences.english: Do you have this in medium ?
Bring remaining 28 ounces stock to a boil in a medium saucepan over high heat.
sentences.chinese: 把剩下的28盎司乾菜加水在中號燉鍋中用高火煮沸。

sentences.english: I'd like a medium popcorn, please.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一份中號的爆玉米花。

sentences.english: Put the rice in a clay pot or a medium-sized pot.
sentences.chinese: 把米放進陶罐裏或者中號的罐子裏。

sentences.english: Heat 2 tablespoons oil in medium nonstick ovenproof skillet over medium-high heat.
sentences.chinese: 用中號不粘平底鍋以中高火加熱2湯勺橄欖油。

sentences.english: I want the jacket in medium size.
sentences.chinese: 我想要這件中號的夾克。

definition: the cap of a pen, pencil or writing brush/the sheath of a pen (made of cloth, silk or thread)
pressure crease/fig. to toil for sb else's benefit/line ball (i.e. on the line)
weight/pendant/same as 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]/ballad singing accompanied by a 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]
